entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:51 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Barrhead 9:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -17.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Fog. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Fog. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
